article: the lotus development corp. capitulated on sunday to ibm 's surprise hostile takeover bid , but not before convincing ibm to raise its price to more than $ #.# billion in cash _ and to guarantee the innovative software manufacturer a degree of independence unique in what was once one of the country 's most unk corporations .
